column2: title=A Philological Miscellany Presented to Eilert Ekwall

column1: '''''A Philological Miscellany Presented to Eilert Ekwall''''' is a 1942 [[Wikipedia:Festschrift
column2: Festschrift]] presented to mark the occasion of the sixty-fifth birthday of [[Wikipedia:Eilert Ekwall
column3: Eilert Ekwall]], Professor of English at [[Wikipedia:Lund University
column4: Lund University]], Sweden. It constitutes vol. XIV and vol. XV of ''Studia Neophilologica''.<ref>{{webcite
column9: website=[http://www.jstor.org/ ''The Modern Language Review'', Vol. 38, No. 4, October 1943 (at JSTOR.org)]

column1: The volume includes an introductory note signed by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], Kenneth Sisam, [[R.W. Chambers]], J. Turville-Petre, [[Charles Leslie Wrenn
